sn35.126:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava nalandayam viharati pavarikambavane.
sn35.126:1.2: Atha kho, upali gahapati, yena bhagava tenupasankami …pe… ekamantam nisinno kho, upali gahapati, bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn35.126:1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena m’idhekacce satta dittheva dhamme no parinibbayanti?
sn35.126:1.4: Ko pana, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena m’idhekacce satta dittheva dhamme parinibbayanti”ti?
sn35.126:1.6: “Ayam kho, gahapati, hetu ayam paccayo yena m’idhekacce satta dittheva dhamme parinibbayanti”ti.
